title: Celebrity Sighting!
description: We're rockin' out at the shop today. Look who dropped by today to see what's happening at Bad Panda... the one and only Jerry Cantrell of Alice In Chains! Stay tuned to see what new tattoo ideas he's been brainstorming with Tommy.

title: New Merch
description: Brand new tattoed panda t-shirt is now available in our online store! Available in men's sizes S-3XL. Visit the store to order yours today!

title: New Ergonomic Client Chairs
description: We're excited to announce that we finally received our new fully adjustable tattoo chairs! We're committed to giving you the most comfortable tattoo experience possible, so check out these imported hydraulic chairs that provide support for almost all tattoo positions. Whether you're getting a full back tattoo, leg tattoo or chest tattoo, you'll appreciate the cutting-edge design. Make an appointment today to see the difference!
